ygData.subject: Re: DrillBit resists
ygData.msgSnippet: A tiny spider crawled along the ceiling. He heard Drillbit speak up. He had become impressed by Kit Kats influence, Phobia had chosen and manipulated her well.

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

A tiny spider crawled along the ceiling. He heard Drillbit speak up. He had
become impressed by Kit Kats influence, Phobia had chosen and manipulated
her well. it stared down at Megatron. it wanted to drop down and bite but
knew it had to find the right one. with Kit Kat gone it would have to find
another puppet. Drillbit wasn't it. Megatron wasn't reliable, and Hellbeast
was to much of a maniac for it's ways to work. It had to find another
victim.

Starscream entered, Maybe this was the break he needed. If he could convince
Starscream to take charge it would help. Starscreams power hungry obsessive
complex could be twisted and distorted to the point of command. The spider
intended to be the brains behind the throne once again.


----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, November 29, 2000 5:20 PM
Subject: DrillBit resists


> ::DrillBit::
>
> He layes her down for Waspinator. He goes up to Megatron.
> "Negative! This is a council! You command your group, Hell Beast
> commands his own, and *I* will command this group!"
>
>
>
>
